G

generalFailure(Socket, byte[]) - Static method in class ClientReceive
Prints a general failure message to the client, to communicate to the user that the prior action was not completed successfully.
generalFailure(Socket, byte, byte[]) - Static method in class ServerSend
Sends a general failure message to the client.
getInput(Socket) - Static method in class Client
The getInput method receives the socket connection and handles user input.

H

HEADER_SIZE - Static variable in class ChatProtocol
The size of the header for each message: 6 bytes.
HEARTBEAT - Static variable in class ChatProtocol
Heartbeat opcode to check if client is connected.
heartbeat(Socket) - Static method in class ClientSend
Sends a heartbeat to the server, in order for the server and client to ensure they are both connected to each other.
heartbeat(Socket) - Static method in class ServerSend
Sends a heartbeat message to the client.

M

Client opens a connection to the server via a socket to handle input requests by the user.
main(String[]) - Static method in class Server
Server forks a new thread for each client who connects successfully.

PUSH_MESSAGE_NOTIFICATION - Static variable in class ChatProtocol
Server pushes notification that client has received a message ChatProtocol.PUSH_MESSAGE_NOTIFICATION.
pushMessageNotification(Socket, byte[]) - Static method in class ServerSend
Sends a push message success message to the client, to notify that they successfully received a new message.
pushMessageSuccess(Socket, byte[]) - Static method in class ClientReceive
Prints a push message success message to the client, alerting the user that they have received a new message.

Server - Class in <Unnamed>
Server constants.
Server() - Constructor for class Server
 
ServerReceive - Class in <Unnamed>
ServerReceive contains methods that receives messages from the client, and processes them appropriately.

ServerSend - Class in <Unnamed>
ServerSend contains methods that sends messages to the client, indicating whether corresponding methods in SenderReceive processed user inputs successfully.

U

UNKNOWN_OPCODE - Static variable in class ChatProtocol
Message from the server to the client indicating that a message with an unknown opcode has been received.

V

The version number, currently 0x01.
